The array/replace.hpp header defines macros to replace an element in an array.

Usage

#include <boost/preprocessor/array/replace.hpp>

Contents

  • BOOST_PP_ARRAY_REPLACE
  • BOOST_PP_ARRAY_REPLACE_D
